thread.title: Dave Bawa’s ‘Maar suteya’ is based on his own love story
thread.title_full: Dave Bawa’s ‘Maar suteya’ is based on his own love story - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Dave Bawa’s ‘Maar suteya’ is based on his own love story
text:
Canadian artist Dave Bawa is back with his new track, 'Maar suteya' . The track has been composed by Harj Nagra. The video of the song is high on style, while the lyrics convey a painful love story.
The first single by Dave, 'Aish' had featured American rapper Rush Toor and Punjabi singer Shrey Sean. 'Aish' was received with great applause and became a DJ favourite across the globe. However, 'Maar suteya' has something different to offer. It might soon find a place in the hearts of sad music lovers.
When asked about it, Dave said, "This song is a true story about my first heartbreak in my life. This heartbreak had a lot to do with shaping me as a person, songwriter and the artist I am today."
Source: Simplybhangra.com
WATCH: Maar Suteya (Official Video) - Dave Bawa | Music: Harj Nagra | This Is Me EP
